In project , investigator aim investigate mechanism effect ofneutrophil necroptosis apoptosis : 1. investigate cell molecular mechanism induce neutrophil necroptosis delay apoptosis , mainly focus role HMGB-1 , TNF-Î± LPS , 2. illustrate effect molecule TLR , TNFR , RIP1/RIP3 , Caspase8 , ATP ROS process sigal transduction membrane damage necroptosis apoptosis , 3. identify similarity differences traditional necrosis necroptosis aspects morphologigical change inflammatory cytokine release , 4. find effect mechanisms neutrophil necroptosis apoptosis rheumatoid arthritis mouse model therapeutic effect block one several pathway pathogenesis rheumatoid arthritis . This study unravel mechanism neutrophil necroptosis apoptosis , elucidate role significance inflammation infection , also shed new light anti-inflammatory anti-infection therapy .
